Body:
calibFiles = ['Data/Normalization80_1.calib',
    'Data/Normalization80_3.calib', 'Data/Normalization80_5.calib']
df = DataFile('Data/camea2018n000136.hdf')
print(df.I)
print('----------------------')
df.loadBinning(1)
binnings = df.possibleBinnings
edges = df.instrumentCalibrationEdges
df.updateCalibration(calibFiles)
df.loadBinning(1)
newBinnings = df.possibleBinnings
newEdges = df.instrumentCalibrationEdges
assert len(newBinnings) != len(binnings)
assert not np.any(newEdges != edges)
df.updateCalibration(calibFiles, overwrite=True)
df.loadBinning(1)
newEdges = df.instrumentCalibrationEdges
assert np.any(newEdges != edges)
